content: lalalune: Focused on a massive structural overhaul of the codebase, currently managing the open "V2.0.0" pull request (elizaos/eliza#6351) which involves over 1.8 million lines of additions across more than 22,000 files. This high-volume effort, characterized by 120 commits, represents a significant transition for the project with a heavy emphasis on bugfixes and configuration updates. Their primary focus this week centered on foundational stability and system-wide updates through extensive changes to configuration, code, and test files.
